commit message: Set up for V4.5 (again)
Reset collection's scroll state when changing the filter or sort
Fix resetting scroll state
Don't recreate the action bar in GameActivity
Add settings to the data usage menu
Add a sync of collection items if never updated
Refactor quick log play to not rely on LogPlayActivity
Quick log play - fix bad references to context
Remove quick log logic in LogPlayActivity
The 'playing' notification now launches the view activity instead of the edit.
Add more information to the plays list
Make play count more accurate
Store a play's start time in the DB instead of just the intent
Externalize strings in play list and fix formatting
Show game name and play timer on play fragment; hide playing notification when on the play fragment; only show the start action button when appropriate, show a timer in the playing notification
Add ability to play a game again
Make sync notification ongoing (not dismissable)
Work around bgg bug where collection name's sortindex is incorrect
Correct play count when not in the PlaysActivity
Change some L/R padding to fill the screen, put more spacing under an underlined text header
More narrowing of LR padding

Correctly display the game's collection tab after navigating away and back (was showing the progress bar that didn't disappear). Add date formatting in a the game collection tab and the plays lists (was using BGG's YYYY-MM-DD format)
Change the message when deleting a play that's a draft
Add a few null checks in the DrawerActivity trying to avoid exception being reported in the Play store
Show timer on LogPlayActivity; add an 'end play' button; hide menu items before data is loaded
Add 'end play' button on PlayFragment; hide notification when starting play; minor refactoring around play timer
Add gitignore file; some other adjustments after moving to git
Fix another auth problem - now saving auth token expiry when re-authenticating
Change version name to 'develop'
Use a flag instead of an intent action
Go back to showing the 'playing' notification even when the play or logplay activity is resumed.
Don't attempt to finish PlayActivity after an edit; clean up the edit plays section of ActivityUtils
Before launching LogPlayActivity, go through PlayActivity

Show the correct play when logging a new one
Don't show the PlayActivity if the play doesn't exist
Remove timer when deleting a play
Set to version 4.5
ABS now targets API 18 (not 17)
Don't end a game that hasn't started
Swap result ok/canceled when logging a play to leverage canceled being the default value

Correctly set the result when choosing to play again
Remove bad fragment creating code and change SearchResultsActivity so it's not singletop - this needs to be fixed later by not using SimpleSinglePaneActivity
Merge branch 'release/V4.5'
